title: low FPS rate in replays
body:
Usual fps rate in game is OK, but in replays it's two times lower.  Changing graphic config does nothing. Have anybody such truble, is there any solution?
A10 - 7700k
16gb RAM
R9-280X

FPS ingame - 50-100
FPS replay - ~50 and lower

replies.body: can confirm, normally i have about 30-50 fps and in replays it goes down to 10-20. when i try to use the "highlight recorder" it even drops to 4-5 fps

Replays are still in testing, so it's possible to run in to issues like that.  Report this over to the client devs over at the[ client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards and share your feedback on it.  Thanks for testing!
